B8: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(4″-chlorophenyl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethoxy)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 84%; m.p. 75 °C; R
f = 0.64 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1645 (C=O), 1629 (Ar C=C), 1512 (CH=CH), 1237 (-CF 3), 3011 (Ar C-H stretching), 1155 (-C-O-), 837 (C-Cl); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ: 8.33 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, Ar-CH=), 7.05 (1H d, J = 15.7 Hz, -CO-CH=), 7.92–8.65 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.06–7.89 (4H, m, C-2″, 3″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 343.19 [M + H] +.
